title: Stable but Miscalibrated: A Kantian View on Overconfidence from Filters to Large Language Models
description: This Zenodo record distributes datasets and figure outputs that accompany the manuscript. The PDF is hosted on arXiv, and the full source code is hosted on GitHub. This record intentionally excludes the paper PDF and the full source tree.
notes: This record excludes the manuscript PDF and the full source tree. Please use the arXiv link for the paper and the GitHub repository for code.
